title: B. Fibonacci Number
description: N-chi Fibonacci sonini toping. F(0) = 0, F(1) = 1, F(n) = F(n-1) + F(n-2).
descriptionHtml:
N-chi Fibonacci sonini qaytaring.

Fibonacci ketma-ketligi:

  • F(0) = 0
  • F(1) = 1
  • F(n) = F(n-1) + F(n-2) for n > 1

Misol:

Input: n = 4
Output: 3
Tushuntirish: F(4) = F(3) + F(2) = 2 + 1 = 3
